citation.article-title: Anaerovorax odorimutans gen. nov., sp. nov., a putrescine-fermenting, strictly anaerobic bacterium.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Anaerovorax (An.ae.ro.vo'rax.. Gr. pref. an- non-;Gr. n. aer air ; L. adj. vorax voracious; M.L. masc. n. Anaerovorax an anaerobic, voracious bacterium)
Strictly anaerobic, non-spore-forming bacteria of fermentative metabolism, often metabolizing amino acids.
They have a low DNA G+Â­C content (approx. 30 mol%).
